magpie.data.utilities.modifiers

Class DiscreteToContinuousModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.modifiers.BaseDatasetModifier
      • magpie.data.utilities.modifiers.DiscreteToContinuousModifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Options

    public class DiscreteToContinuousModifier
extends BaseDatasetModifier
    Convert multiple, discrete class values to single continuous class. Converts class values to the probability of an entry being a user-specified class.

    If dataset is a MultiPropertyDataset, this will store result as a new property. Usage: <class name>
    class name: New value will be probability of entry being this class

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
